text_summary: The overall threat assessment indicates a high level of risk across multiple zones due to overcrowding and potential bottlenecks. Immediate interventions are required in high-risk zones to prevent crowd disasters. Continuous monitoring and crowd management strategies are essential across all zones. High crowd densities in adjacent zones can lead to cascade risks.
protocol: Implement crowd dispersal and control measures in high-risk zones, enhance surveillance and monitoring across all zones, develop and communicate emergency response plans, ensure clear escape routes and emergency access.
